ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Provides an extension to factors called 'lfactor' that are similar to factors but allows users to refer to 'lfactor' levels by either the level or the label.
Provides an extension to factors called 'lfactor' that are similar to factors but allows users to refer to 'lfactor' levels by either the level or the label.

name: r-lfactors
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '1.0.4' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-lfactors
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/lfactors_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/lfactors/lfactors_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 8c35649c895f84c6f82de80cca5795dbcef00a064fa5eee418a2ea3f24a718e5

build:
  number: 4
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('lfactors')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('lfactors')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=lfactors
  license: GPL-2.0-only
  summary: Provides an extension to factors called 'lfactor' that are similar to factors but
    allows users to refer to 'lfactor' levels by either the level or the label.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - khusmann

# Package: lfactors
# Version: 1.0.4
# Date: 2018-03-16
# Title: Factors with Levels
# Authors@R: c(person("Paul", "Bailey", role=c("aut", "cre"), email="pbailey@air.org"))
# Author: Paul Bailey [aut, cre]
# Maintainer: Paul Bailey <pbailey@air.org>
# Depends: R (>= 3.1.0)
# Imports: methods, stats, utils
# Suggests: testthat, Matrix
# Description: Provides an extension to factors called 'lfactor' that are similar to factors but allows users to refer to 'lfactor' levels by either the level or the label.
# License: GPL-2
# RoxygenNote: 6.0.1
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2018-03-16 18:28:25 UTC; pbailey
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2018-03-16 21:41:08 UTC
